alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 6:06PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade and south central Broward Counties through 645 PM EST... At 605 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a gusty shower capable of producing a funnel cloud over Miccosukee Resort, or 11 miles northwest of Kendall, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Miami Gardens, Kendall, Doral, Miami Lakes, Hialeah Gardens, Opa-Locka, Sweetwater, Medley, Fountainbleau, Kendale Lakes, Palm Springs North, Country Club, Pennsuco, Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, Miccosukee Resort, Tamiami and University Park. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
